# foxy-plugin-warning

This is an **internal** component that displays a warning when it detects some kind of text input interference caused by a browser extension. **If you aren't a member of FoxyCart team, we advise you against using this element in your code as we won't be ensuring its compatibility across different versions.**

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                 | Type  | Default                           |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------- | ----- | --------------------------------- |
| `locale` | `locale`  | The language to display element content in. | `any` | `i18n.defaults.locale.call(this)` |


## Methods

### `close() => Promise<void>`

Closes the notification and prevents it
from appearing again after reload.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
